thread.title: TripAdvisor: Best amusement parks, zoos and aquariums
thread.title_full: TripAdvisor: Best amusement parks, zoos and aquariums

author: Nancy Trejos , USA TODAY
title: TripAdvisor: Best amusement parks, zoos and aquariums
text:
TripAdvisor has chosen its top 10 Travelers' Choice theme parks in both the USA and the world. Coming in at No. 1 for the USA is Universal's Islands of Adventure in Orlando. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 2: Discovery Cove in Orlando. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 3: Walt Disney World's Magic Kingdom in Orlando. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 4: Universal Studios Hollywood in Los Angeles. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 5: Walt Disney World's Disney's Hollywood Studios in Orlando. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 6: Universal Studios Florida in Orlando. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 7: Disneyland Park in Anaheim, Calif. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 8: Walt Disney World's Disney's Animal Kingdom in Orlando. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 9: Cedar Point Amusement Park in Sandusky, Ohio. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 10: SeaWorld in Orlando. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen Coming in at No. 1 for the entire world is Universal's Islands of Adventure in Orlando. You may also like these photo galleries: Replay Autoplay Show Thumbnails Show Captions Last Slide Next Slide Disneyland came in at No. 7 on TripAdvisor's ranking of the best amusement parks in the USA. (Photo: TripAdvisor)
101 CONNECT 71 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN 2 COMMENT EMAIL MORE Orlando dominated the list of travelers' favorite theme park destinations in the world, TripAdvisor announced today.
TripAdvisor examined millions of reviews from travelers around the world over a year to come up with its top 244 attractions in theme parks, zoos and aquariums. Winners were based on the quantity and quality of reviews.
"Appealing to the young and young at heart, these entertaining enclaves offer a variety of budget-friendly accommodations and dining options that are highly-rated on TripAdvisor," says Barbara Messing, chief marketing officer for TripAdvisor.
The top amusement park in the USA and world was Universal's Islands of Adventure in Orlando. Discovery Cove and Magic Kingdom rounded out the top three in the USA and the world.
Universal Studios Hollywood, Disney's Hollywood Studios and Universal Studios Florida also made the top of both lists in the USA and the world.
TripAdvisor also named the top water parks, zoos and aquariums in the USA.
Amusement Parks in the USA:
Universal's Islands of Adventure, Orlando Discovery Cove, Orlando Magic Kingdom, Orlando Universal Studios Hollywood, Los Angeles Disney's Hollywood Studios, Orlando Universal Studios Hollywood, Los Angeles Disneyland Park, Anaheim, Calif. Disney's Animal Kingdom, Orlando Cedar Point Amusement Park, Sandusky, Ohio SeaWorld Orlando TripAdvisor has announced their top 10 Travelers' Choice list for the best water parks in the USA and world. Disney's Typhoon Lagoon in Orlando took the No. 1 spot for the USA. (Photo: TripAdvisor) Fullscreen No. 2: Disney's Blizzard Beach in Orlando.
